description: a(1) = 1, after which, if a(n-1) = 1, a(n) = 1 + the total number of 1's that have occurred in the sequence so far, otherwise a(n) = the total number of times the least prime dividing a(n-1) [i.e., A020639(a(n-1))] occurs as a divisor (counted with multiplicity for each term) in the previous terms from a(1) up to and including a(n-1).
